title: Categories
description: I think it would be a better idea for the categories in the sidebar to have their own pages, wikimedia style. For example, clicking on Utility would bring up a page similar to http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Aviation_in_art. I don't know anything about running wikis but it should be as simple as changing a few words from a category-template page.

replies.body: I did that for the Bronze Steam Machines, but I'd need to poke around with the wiki architecture a bit to make the tabs actual buttons.
... Providing that's actually possible; I think the tab buttons might be limited just to tags
Each tab is every page which has a tag with the same name as the tab. Your idea could still work though
